message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $999000. I've only got one of these left, and I'm looking to make a deal today. If you're interested, please respond with 'yes' to purchase.
Great, I'll take it. Thanks for the discount!

I'm willing to offer you a'special deal' on this one, but I need you to be aware that it's a one-time offer. I'm willing to let it go for $999500.
